name: Girls Shop
description:
In the game Girls Shop you will have to put on glasses again, in which you will see all the girls naked. Don't miss your opportunity and put them on! Put on your glasses and watch beautiful naked girls shop in the store! Relaxing music will let you immerse yourself in this process.

In the first-person game, you have to put on glasses that allow you to see all the girls naked! See all the girls without exception! You also have the option to switch to a slow motion effect for an even better view of what naked girls are up to! With relaxing music, immerse yourself in this exciting process and get the most out of this game!

Features of the game:
Relaxing music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Beautiful naked girls who are nice to watch!
Very beautiful graphics!
